summary: This is an email from the FBI New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit regarding search terms for a 'taint review' related to Jeffrey Epstein. It shows internal coordination on document review procedures.

persons.name: Steve
persons.context: Mentioned as being available to answer questions about the taint review search terms alongside the email sender and another detective.

persons.name: Det.
persons.context: Described as the email sender's partner who sits next to them and will be available to answer questions about the taint review search terms.

connections.description: Both are mentioned as available contacts to answer questions about the taint review search terms, indicating they work together in the FBI unit.

events.title: Taint review search terms coordination
events.description: An email is sent from the FBI New York Field Office regarding search terms for a taint review related to the Epstein case, with multiple contacts made available for questions.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit dated August 5, 2020.
It discusses 'taint review search terms' for the Jeffrey Epstein investigation, indicating ongoing procedural work.
The email references an attached file named 'Epstein Priv terms.docx' which contains the search terms.
Multiple FBI personnel (Steve and a detective) are designated as contacts for questions about the review process.
